headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; media-src 'self' https://xombix.com https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com blob: data:; frame-src https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com; connect-src *; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com;
